import { useState } from "react"; import { useFetchPricingCurrencyQuery, useFetchPricingTierQuery } from "services/courses"; import classNames from "classnames"; export const Pricing = () => { const { data: currencies } = useFetchPricingCurrencyQuery() const { data: tiers} = useFetchPricingTierQuery() const [toggleCurrency, setToggleCurrency ] = useState(false) const [ toggleTier, setToggleTier ] = useState(false) const [ currency, setCurrency] = useState({ name: 'USD', display: 'USD' }) const [ amount, setAmount ] = useState({ name: 100, display: '100' }) return (
